hobby_list.title: Travel
hobby_list.image_description: A photo of Chinyero volcano I took on Tenerife
details: I love exploring new countries and immersing myself in different cultures.
Traveling gives me a fresh perspective on life and helps me grow both personally and intellectually.

hobby_list.title: Learning Languages
hobby_list.image_description: Some simple sentences I wrote in Japanese
details: I'm currently studying Japanese and plan to start learning Spanish soon.
Language learning fascinates me because it opens doors to understanding other cultures and connecting with people globally.

hobby_list.title: Board Games
details: I enjoy playing board games as a way to relax, strategize, and socialize with friends.
Whether it's a fast-paced card game or a complex strategy game, I love the challenge and teamwork they involve.
